title: Looking for 2 people for ranked 5s open ladder split
body:
Hi all, 
         Myself and 2 mates are looking for 2 people to join our group and make a ranked 5s team. We are currently gold 1, plat 4 and diamond 5. We would hope for people around the same skill. We have our bot lane set up (adc and sup) and our other person is willing to play mid or top... if you fill like you can commit to playing in an enjoyable team looking to succeed and get better and fill one of the spots needed please add : FTE Fissure or doomlord ingame for a chat :)

replies.body: Chat roulette is a good way to find more men
Added you on League to discuss.

I will bless your team and join.

But you need to all assist in dusting my beanbag between games k?
